explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions machine learning as a key discipline and discusses a new supervised learning algorithm.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper proposes a new supervised learning algorithm called D1-NN (Dynamic 1-Nearest Neighbor).
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on a classifier (D1-NN) and compares its performance against other classifiers.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper compares the performance of D1-NN against support vector machines among other classifiers.
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as one of the classifiers compared against the proposed D1-NN algorithm.
explanations.neural network: The paper compares the performance of D1-NN against neural networks among other classifiers.
